0.text: Can prepare and cook a simple meal unaided

4.text: Needs supervision or assistance to either prepare or cook a simple meal

2.0.text: Needs to use an aid or appliance to be able to either prepare or cook a simple meal

2.1.text: Cannot cook a simple meal using a conventional cooker but is able to do so using a microwave

2.2.text: Needs prompting to be able to either prepare or cook a simple meal

4.text: Needs prompting to be able to take nutrition

6.text: Needs assistance to be able to manage a therapeutic source to take nutrition

8.text: Cannot convey food and drink to their mouth and needs another person to do so

2.0.text:
Needs either:
  • to use an aid or appliance to be able to take nutrition
  • supervision to be able to take nutrition
  • assistance to be able to cut up food

2.1.text: Needs a therapeutic source to be able to take nutrition

managingTherapy.name: Managing therapy or monitoring a health condition

0.text:
Either:
  • does not receive medication or therapy or need to monitor a health condition
  • or can manage medication or therapy or monitor a health condition unaided

1.text:
Needs either:
  • to use an aid or appliance to be able to manage medication
  • supervision, prompting or assistance to be able to manage medication or monitor a health condition
  • supervision, prompting or assistance to be able to monitor a health condition

2.text: Needs supervision, prompting or assistance to be able to manage therapy that takes no more than 3.5 hours a week

4.text: Needs supervision, prompting or assistance to be able to manage therapy that takes more than 3.5 but no more than 7 hours a week

6.text: Needs supervision, prompting or assistance to be able to manage therapy that takes more than 7 but no more than 14 hours a week

8.text: Needs supervision, prompting or assistance to be able to manage therapy that takes more than 14 hours a week

3.text: Needs assistance to be able to get in or out of a bath or shower

4.text: Needs assistance to be able to wash their body between the shoulders and waist

8.text: Cannot wash and bathe at all and needs another person to wash their entire body

2.0.text: Needs to use an aid or appliance to be able to wash or bathe

2.1.text: Needs supervision or prompting to be able to wash or bathe

2.2.text: Needs assistance to be able to wash either their hair or body below the waist

0.text: Can manage toilet needs or incontinence unaided

4.text: Needs assistance to be able to manage toilet needs

6.text: Needs assistance to be able to manage incontinence of either bladder and bowel

8.text: Needs assistance to be able to manage incontinence of both bladder and bowel

2.0.text: Needs to use an aid or appliance to be able to manage toilet needs or incontinence

2.1.text: Needs supervision or prompting to be able to manage toilet needs

4.text: Needs assistance to be able to dress or undress their upper body

8.text: Cannot dress or undress at all

2.0.text: Needs to use an aid or appliance to be able to dress or undress

2.1.text:
Needs either:
  • prompting to be able to dress, undress or determine appropriate circumstances for remaining clothed
  • prompting or assistance to be able to select appropriate clothing

2.2.text: Needs assistance to be able to dress or undress their lower body

0.text: Can express and understand verbal information unaided

2.text: Needs to use an aid or appliance to be able to speak or hear

4.text: Needs communication support to be able to express or understand complex verbal information

8.text: Needs communication support to be able to express or understand basic verbal information

12.text: Cannot express or understand verbal information at all even with communication support

readingAndUnderstanding.name: Reading and understanding signs, symbols and words

0.text: Can read and understand basic and complex written information either unaided or using spectacles or contact lenses

4.text: Needs prompting to be able to read or understand basic written information

8.text: Cannot read or understand signs, symbols or words at all

2.0.text: Needs to use an aid or appliance, other than spectacles or contact lenses, to be able to read or understand either basic or complex written information

2.1.text: Needs prompting to be able to read or understand complex written information

engagingWithOtherPeople.name: Engaging with other people face to face

0.text: Can engage with other people unaided

2.text: Needs prompting to be able to engage with other people

4.text: Needs social support to be able to engage with other people

8.text:
Cannot engage with other people due to such engagement causing either:
  • overwhelming psychological distress to the claimant
  • the claimant to exhibit behaviour which would result in a substantial risk of harm to the claimant or another person

0.text: Can manage complex budgeting decisions unaided

4.text: Needs prompting or assistance to be able to make simple budgeting decisions

6.text: Cannot make any budgeting decisions at all

2.text: Needs prompting or assistance to be able to make complex budgeting decisions

0.text: Can plan and follow the route of a journey unaided

4.text: Needs prompting to be able to undertake any journey to avoid overwhelming psychological distress to the claimant

8.text: Cannot plan the route of a journey

10.0.text: Cannot follow the route of an unfamiliar journey without another person, assistance dog or orientation aid

10.1.text: Cannot undertake any journey because it would cause overwhelming psychological distress to the claimant

12.text: Cannot follow the route of a familiar journey without another person, an assistance dog or an orientation aid

0.text: Can stand and then move more than 200 metres, either aided or unaided

4.text: Can stand and then move more than 50 metres but no more than 200 metres, either aided or unaided

8.text: Can stand and then move unaided more than 20 metres but no more than 50 metres

10.text: Can stand and then move using an aid or appliance more than 20 metres but no more than 50 metres

12.0.text: Can stand and then move more than 1 metre but no more than 20 metres, either aided or unaided

12.1.text:
Cannot, either aided or unaided:
  • stand
  • move more than 1 metre
